import sys

t = int(raw_input())

while t:

    candle_count =  map(int,raw_input().split())
    min_index = candle_count.index(min(candle_count))
    sum = 0
    
    if min_index == 0:
        
        if candle_count[0] >= min( candle_count[1:] ):

            candle_count[min_index]= max(candle_count)+1
            min_index = candle_count.index(min(candle_count))
    
        else:
            sys.stdout.write('1')

    print str(min_index)*(1+min(candle_count)) 
                        
    t-=1
